name: Honey Garlic Chicken
instructions: Mince garlic and mix with honey, soy sauce, and rice vinegar.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Season chicken thighs with salt and pepper.
Sear chicken for 5 minutes per side until golden.
Pour honey garlic sauce over chicken.
Reduce heat and simmer for 10-15 minutes until sauce thickens.
Garnish with sesame seeds and green onions.

name: Turkey Meatballs with Marinara
instructions: Preheat oven to 400Â°F.
Mix ground turkey, breadcrumbs, parmesan, egg, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Form into 1.5-inch meatballs.
Place on oiled baking sheet.
Bake for 20 minutes until cooked through.
Heat marinara sauce in a large pan.
Add meatballs and simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with fresh basil and serve.

name: Classic Ribeye Steak
instructions: Remove steak from fridge 30 minutes before cooking.
Season generously with salt and pepper.
Heat cast iron skillet over high heat until smoking.
Add olive oil and sear steak 3-4 minutes per side for medium-rare.
Add butter, garlic, rosemary, and thyme to pan.
Baste steak with melted butter for 1 minute.
Rest for 5 minutes before slicing.

name: Grilled Marinated Flank Steak
instructions: Mix soy sauce, olive oil, lime juice, garlic, honey, cumin, and red pepper flakes.
Marinate flank steak for at least 2 hours, preferably overnight.
Preheat grill to high heat.
Remove steak from marinade and pat dry.
Grill 4-5 minutes per side for medium-rare.
Rest for 10 minutes.
Slice against the grain and garnish with cilantro.

name: Sesame Chicken
instructions: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Whisk eggs with salt, dip chicken, then coat in tempura mix.
Fry chicken in oil until golden and cooked through. Drain on paper towels.
Mix ketchup, soy sauce, brown sugar, honey, rice vinegar, garlic, sesame oil, and cornstarch.
Cook sauce in a pan until thickened.
Toss fried chicken in sauce, top with sesame seeds and green onions.
Serve over rice.

name: General Tso's Chicken
instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Mix flour, cornstarch, egg, and salt for batter.
Coat chicken and fry until golden and crispy.
Mix water, soy sauce, ketchup, sesame oil, brown sugar, and cornstarch for sauce.
Cook sauce until thickened, toss with fried chicken.
Serve over jasmine rice with green onions and sesame seeds.

name: Baked Crispy Chicken Schnitzel
instructions: Preheat oven to 420Â°F.
Whisk eggs with salt, pepper, paprika, cumin, Dijon, honey, lemon juice, garlic, and 2 tbsp olive oil.
Coat chicken in egg mixture, then in combined breadcrumbs and sesame seeds.
Place on parchment-lined pan drizzled with 3 tbsp olive oil.
Drizzle remaining olive oil on top. Bake 15 mins, flip, bake 10 more mins.
Broil at 450Â°F for 7-8 mins until golden. Top with flaky salt.

name: Chicken & Veggie Sheet Pan with Chipotle Sauce
instructions: Marinate sliced chicken in mayo, oil, honey, lime juice, garlic, and all seasonings.
Roast whole garlic head (drizzled with oil) wrapped in foil at 425Â°F for 45-60 mins.
Toss sliced veggies with oil and seasonings on sheet pan, add chicken.
Bake 20-25 mins until chicken is cooked and veggies are tender.
Blend roasted garlic, sour cream, mayo, chipotles, honey, and lime for sauce.
Serve chicken and veggies with chipotle sauce.

name: Thai Lettuce Wraps
instructions: SautÃ© onion, garlic, and chilies in oil until fragrant.
Add ground chicken, break apart, cook until no longer pink.
Add bell pepper. Mix fish sauce, soy sauce, oyster sauce, and brown sugar, pour over chicken.
Cook 2-3 mins until sauce reduces. Stir in lime juice and basil.
Serve in lettuce cups topped with peanuts and green onions.

name: Rotisserie Chicken Sandwich
instructions: Whisk vinegar, olive oil, Dijon, garlic powder, honey, lemon juice, and herbs for vinaigrette.
Slice baguette and toast lightly.
Layer arugula, sliced tomatoes, shredded chicken, and feta.
Drizzle with vinaigrette and serve.

name: Thai Basil Fried Rice
instructions: Mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, fish sauce, and sugar for sauce.
Scramble eggs in hot wok, remove and set aside.
SautÃ© butterflied chicken until cooked, remove.
Stir-fry onion, garlic, and peppers for 1 min.
Add rice and sauce, stir-fry 2-3 mins on high heat.
Add back eggs and chicken. Toss in Thai basil until wilted. Serve with lime.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Mix yogurt with garam masala, turmeric, cumin, chili powder, garlic, ginger, lemon juice, and salt.
Marinate chicken pieces for 1-6 hours.
Bake at 400Â°F for 15-20 mins or grill until slightly charred.
In a skillet, heat oil, add chicken, pour in tikka masala sauce.
Simmer 10-15 mins. Stir in cream if desired. Garnish with cilantro.

name: Lemon Pepper Chicken
instructions: Mix olive oil, lemon pepper, lemon juice, honey, garlic, and salt.
Coat chicken and marinate 30 mins or more.
Grill or bake at 400Â°F until cooked through (about 20 mins).
Garnish with fresh cilantro.

name: Pulled Chicken Sliders
instructions: Season chicken with salt, pepper, garlic powder, paprika.
Slow cook on low 6-8 hrs (or high 3-4 hrs) with broth, BBQ sauce, vinegar, and brown sugar.
Shred chicken with two forks, mix with sauce.
Make slaw: mix mayo, vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper; toss with cabbage and carrots.
Assemble sliders with chicken, slaw, pickles, and Dijon.

name: Pad See Ew
instructions: Marinate sliced chicken in 1.5 tbsp soy sauce for 30 mins.
Cook chicken to 80%, remove from pan.
Add garlic and eggs, let set slightly then break up.
Add broccoli and rice noodles, cook 3 mins.
Pour combined sauce (oyster, soy, fish sauce, sugar, pepper) over noodles.
Cook on high 2-3 mins, add back chicken. Serve with chili vinegar.

name: Korean Glass Noodles Stir Fry
instructions: Cook glass noodles per package. Whisk sauce ingredients (tamari, broth, cornstarch).
Brown ground chicken in oil for 7 mins.
Add ginger, bell pepper, and white parts of green onions until soft.
Add garlic, cook 30 seconds. Pour sauce over mixture.
Spread on sheet pan, bake at 425Â°F for 15 mins, toss, bake 10-15 more mins.
Serve over rice with green onions and sesame seeds.

name: Ground Chicken Ramen Noodles
instructions: Brown ground chicken in avocado oil.
Add bell pepper, onion, and broccoli. Stir-fry until slightly tender.
Cook ramen noodles per package, drain.
Mix garlic, ginger, chicken broth, and tamari for sauce.
Pour sauce over chicken and veggies, add noodles, toss to combine.

name: Sheet Pan Cashew Chicken
instructions: Whisk all sauce ingredients until starch is dissolved.
Toss chicken, veggies, and cashews in sauce. Marinate while oven preheats to 425Â°F.
Spread on sheet pan in single layer.
Bake 15 mins, toss, bake 10-15 more mins.
Serve over rice.

name: Crispy Parm Chicken with Lemon Orzo
instructions: Butterfly chicken. Dredge in flour, dip in egg, coat in panko/parmesan/garlic powder mix.
Pan-fry in olive oil 4 mins per side until golden.
For orzo: sautÃ© shallot and garlic in butter and oil.
Add orzo, broth, lemon zest and juice, pepper. Simmer until tender.
Stir in parmesan and cream. Serve chicken over orzo.

name: Chicken Shawarma
instructions: Mix olive oil, yogurt, tomato paste, lemon juice, garlic, and all spices.
Slice chicken into strips, coat in marinade.
Bake at 400Â°F for 15 mins.
Serve in pita with onions and garlic yogurt sauce.

name: Pulled Chicken Sandwich with Slaw
instructions: Pour BBQ sauce and diced onion in slow cooker, add chicken, coat well.
Cook on high 3-4 hrs or low 6-8 hrs. Shred chicken, return to sauce.
Make slaw: mix mayo, honey, vinegar, salt, pepper. Toss with cabbages, carrot, cilantro.
Serve pulled chicken on buns topped with slaw.

name: Turkey Burger
instructions: Mix ground turkey with breadcrumbs, egg, mayo, garlic, scallions, parsley, feta, and seasonings.
Form into 4 patties.
Grill or pan-fry until cooked through (165Â°F internal).
Serve on buns with tomato, avocado, and red onion.

name: Beef and Broccoli
instructions: Slice beef thin against the grain. Toss with 2 tbsp soy sauce and 1 tbsp cornstarch. Marinate 10 mins.
Blanch broccoli 2 mins, transfer to ice water.
Mix remaining soy sauce, brown sugar, oyster sauce, vinegar, garlic, ginger for sauce.
Sear beef in hot oil 1-2 mins per side, set aside.
Stir-fry broccoli 2 mins, return beef, pour in sauce.
Add cornstarch slurry (1 tbsp cornstarch + 2 tbsp water) to thicken. Serve over rice.

name: Garlic Ginger Steak Stir-Fry
instructions: Slice steak thin against grain. Marinate in soy, oyster, hoisin, vinegar, cornstarch for 15-20 mins.
Stir-fry steak in batches in hot oil 2-3 mins until browned. Set aside.
Stir-fry onions, peppers, garlic, and ginger 2-3 mins until tender-crisp.
Return steak, add broth, stir until sauce thickens.
Drizzle with sesame oil, garnish with sesame seeds and green onions. Serve over rice or noodles.

name: Chuck Roast Tacos
instructions: Preheat oven to 325Â°F. Season roast generously with salt and pepper.
Place in Dutch oven, cover, and bake 3-4 hrs until fork-tender.
Shred meat, toss in rendered fat. Return to oven uncovered at 425Â°F for 20-25 mins until edges crisp.
Make guacamole: mash avocados with lime juice, orange juice, salt, pepper, red onion, cilantro.
Serve in warm tortillas with guacamole, white onion, cilantro, and salsa.

name: Thai Skirt Steak and Herb Salad
instructions: Combine coconut sugar, broth, tamari, oil, fish sauce, lime zest/juice, ginger, red pepper flakes.
Reserve 1/4 for dressing. Marinate steak in remaining mixture 4 hrs or overnight.
Sear steak in hot skillet 4 mins per side for medium-rare. Rest 10 mins, slice against grain.
Toss lettuce, mint, cilantro, green onions, and peanuts.
Top salad with sliced steak, drizzle with reserved dressing.

name: Doner Kebab Sandwich
instructions: Mix ground beef with grated onion, 1/4 cup yogurt, garlic, paprika, chili powder, pepper, salt. Shape into log.
Bake at 400Â°F for 15 mins. Unroll and broil 3 more mins.
Make tahini sauce: blend tahini, lemon juice, garlic, 1/4 cup yogurt, water, salt.

name: Garlic Pepper Beef
instructions: Brown ground beef with freshly cracked pepper and red pepper flakes.
Mix soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic, water, and cornstarch for sauce.
Pour sauce over beef, cook until thickened.
Serve over rice with a fried egg, green onions, and sesame seeds.

name: Honey Sriracha Glass Noodles & Meatballs
instructions: Mix beef, egg, diced onion, bell pepper, garlic, ginger, 0.5 tbsp sriracha, red pepper flakes, salt, pepper, oats. Form 8 meatballs, chill 20-30 mins.
Whisk sauce: remaining sriracha, tamari, vinegar, coconut sugar, honey. Reserve 1/3 for basting, add broth to rest.
Bake meatballs at 425Â°F for 15 mins, baste halfway, bake 2-3 more mins.
Cook glass noodles, toss with sesame oil. Stir-fry zucchini and snap peas, add sauce, simmer.
Toss noodles in sauce, nestle in meatballs. Garnish with sesame seeds and cilantro.

name: One Pot Mongolian Beef Noodles
instructions: Brown ground beef, drain all but 2 tbsp fat. Cook until crispy brown bits form.
Add garlic, ginger, red pepper flakes. Cook 1 min until fragrant.
Mix 1 cup broth, tamari, coconut sugar, vinegar, fish sauce. Pour half over beef.
Add remaining 2 cups broth, drop in ramen bricks. Simmer, flip noodles after 2-3 mins.
Whisk arrowroot into remaining sauce, pour over noodles. Stir until thickened.
Top with green onions and sesame seeds.

name: Spinach and Parmesan Orzo
instructions: Toast orzo in olive oil with garlic for 1-2 mins.
Add broth, simmer covered until liquid absorbed (12-15 mins).
Stir in spinach until wilted.
Add milk, cook 1-2 mins until creamy.
Stir in parmesan, season with salt, pepper, and nutmeg.

name: 4-Ingredient Mac & Cheese
instructions: Bring broth to boil in large pan, add noodles.
Cook 3 mins less than package directions, stirring to release starches.
Lower heat, stir in evaporated milk. Simmer until 1/3 milk remains.
Remove from heat, stir in grated cheese until smooth. Serve immediately.

name: Mashed Potatoes
instructions: Peel and cube potatoes. Boil in salted water until tender (15-20 mins).
Drain and let steam dry for 1-2 mins.
Mash with butter until smooth.
Gradually add milk, mashing until desired consistency.
Season with salt and pepper.

name: Pasta with Mushroom, Spinach & Parmesan
instructions: Cook pasta al dente, drain and set aside.
SautÃ© mushrooms in olive oil 3 mins. Add garlic, cook 1-2 mins.
Deglaze with broth, remove mushrooms to a plate.
Wilt spinach in same skillet, season with salt and pepper.
Combine pasta, spinach, mushrooms, parmesan, Italian seasoning, red pepper flakes.

name: Lemon Ricotta Pasta with Broccoli
instructions: Cook pasta until 3 mins shy of al dente, add broccoli, cook until pasta is done.
Reserve 1 cup pasta water, drain.
Toss pasta and broccoli with ricotta, parmesan, lemon zest and juice, chili flakes, salt, pepper.
Add pasta water as needed for creamy consistency.

name: Hibachi Chicken Bowl
instructions: Mix chicken with oyster sauce, sesame oil, cornstarch, salt, pepper. Marinate 15 mins.
Sear chicken in 1 tbsp oil over medium-high heat 4-5 mins until golden, then cook 2-3 more mins. Remove.
Add remaining oil, sautÃ© onions 2-3 mins, then add zucchini, garlic, soy sauce, sesame seeds. Cook 3-4 mins.
Return chicken, add butter, stir until melted. Serve over jasmine rice with sesame seeds.

name: Hot Honey Chicken (Slow Cooker)
instructions: Mix spices (pepper flakes, paprika, garlic powder, sugar, salt). Coat chicken, place in slow cooker.
Pour honey, vinegar, and oil over chicken. Cook on low 3-4 hrs until 165Â°F.
Shred chicken, reserve 1/2 cup sauce, return chicken to cooker.
Roast cubed sweet potatoes at 425Â°F with oil, salt, pepper for 35-40 mins.
Make slaw: whisk mayo, pickle juice, garlic powder, salt, pepper. Toss with coleslaw, pickles, onion.
Serve chicken over rice with sweet potatoes, slaw, and reserved hot honey sauce.

name: Teriyaki Chicken and Broccoli Rice Bowls
instructions: Mix sauce ingredients (garlic, ginger, water, soy sauce, brown sugar). Reserve 1 cup, marinate chicken in rest for 30 mins.
Cook rice: 1 cup rice + 1.25 cups water, simmer covered 12-15 mins.
Sear chicken in oil 5-6 mins per side until charred and 160Â°F. Rest and slice.
Heat reserved sauce, whisk in cornstarch slurry (1 tbsp + 1 tbsp water), cook until thick. Stir in vinegar.
Microwave broccoli with 2 tbsp water for 2-4 mins. Serve chicken over rice with broccoli and teriyaki sauce.

name: Thai Chicken Burger with Spicy Peanut Slaw
instructions: Make slaw: whisk peanut butter, lime juice, sugar, vinegar, soy sauce, sriracha, water. Toss with cabbage and carrots.
Mix chicken with garlic, scallions, basil, chili, fish sauce, lime juice, coriander, sugar, salt, pepper. Form 3 patties.
Pan-fry patties 2-3 mins per side until golden, bake at 350Â°F for 10-12 mins until 165Â°F.
Toast buns under broiler. Serve burgers with cucumber, peanut slaw, and basil.

name: Chipotle Chicken Rice Bowls
instructions: Marinate chicken in lime juice, 2 tbsp cilantro, all spices, oil, and salt for 20+ mins.
Make cilantro lime rice: cook rice, stir in 3 tbsp cilantro, lime juice, butter.
Sear chicken 5-6 mins per side until 165Â°F. Rest 5 mins, cube.
Serve chicken over rice with feta, cucumber, tomato, onion, and yogurt sauce.

name: Chicken Kofta with Tzatziki and Lemon Dill Rice
instructions: Make tzatziki: mix grated cucumber, yogurt, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, salt.
Make rice: boil stock with salt and garlic, add rice, simmer 20 mins. Stir in lemon zest, dill, butter.
Mix chicken with onion, parsley, mint, garlic, egg, spices, salt, pepper.
Pan-fry 1 tbsp portions in oil for 2-3 mins per side until 165Â°F.
Serve kofta with lemon dill rice, tzatziki, and sliced veggies.

name: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Preheat oven to 425Â°F. Pound chicken to 1/3" thick, season with salt and pepper.
Set up dredging: flour, beaten eggs, combined breadcrumbs and 1/4 cup parmesan.
Coat chicken in flour, egg, then breadcrumb mixture. Place on greased baking sheet.
On separate pan, spread marinara and make two mozzarella piles. Sprinkle with parmesan.
Spray chicken with oil, bake 12-15 mins until 165Â°F. Bake cheese 8-10 mins until golden.
Top chicken with melted cheese and sauce. Garnish with parsley and parmesan.

name: Moroccan Spiced Meatballs with Lemon Garlic Yogurt
instructions: Soak panko in milk 5 mins. Mix with beef, garlic, parsley, egg, all spices, salt. Set aside.
Make salad: toss diced cucumber, tomatoes, onion, parsley, lemon juice, 2 tbsp olive oil, salt, pepper.
Make yogurt sauce: mix yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, parsley, 2 tbsp olive oil, salt.
Make couscous: boil 1 cup water with salt and 1 tbsp oil, add couscous, cover 5 mins, fluff.
Form meatballs (1 heaping tbsp each), pan-fry in oil 2-3 mins per side until 160Â°F.
Serve meatballs with couscous, chopped salad, and lemon garlic yogurt.

name: Mom's Spaghetti and Meatballs
instructions: Soak panko in milk 10 mins. Mix with beef, sausage, parsley, eggs, garlic, white wine, parmesan, salt, pepper.
Form 2.5" meatballs, bake at 425Â°F for 18-20 mins until 165Â°F.
For sauce: sautÃ© onion and garlic in olive oil until translucent. Add crushed tomatoes, Italian seasoning, red wine. Simmer 25-30 mins.
Add meatballs and pan drippings to sauce, simmer.
Boil spaghetti al dente. Toss with sauce and serve with meatballs, parmesan, and parsley.

name: Beef Pepper Steak
instructions: Slice steak thin against grain. Marinate in cornstarch, sesame oil, 1 tbsp soy sauce, salt, pepper, water, 1 clove garlic, 1 tsp ginger for 15 mins.
Mix sauce: water, oyster sauce, black bean garlic sauce, 1 tbsp soy sauce, vinegar, 1 tbsp cornstarch, pepper, sugar.
Stir-fry onions with half the garlic and ginger 2-3 mins. Add peppers 3-4 mins until blistered. Remove.
Sear steak 2-3 mins, stir-fry until medium-rare. Add remaining garlic, ginger, tomatoes 1-2 mins.
Return veggies, add sauce, bring to boil until thickened. Stir in scallions. Serve over rice.

name: Lamb Meatballs Gyros
instructions: Make tzatziki: mix grated cucumber, yogurt, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, salt.
Soak panko in milk 10 mins. Mix with lamb, onion, garlic, mint, egg, lemon zest, oregano, cumin, coriander, salt, pepper.
Form into 2 tbsp meatballs, flatten slightly. Pan-fry in oil 2-3 mins per side until 165Â°F.
Toast pitas lightly with oil on both sides.
Spread tzatziki on pita, add 3-4 meatballs, sliced veggies, more tzatziki. Enjoy!

name: Greek Meatballs with Tzatziki and Lemon Dill Rice
instructions: Soak panko in milk 10 mins. Mix with lamb, onion, garlic, mint, egg, lemon zest, oregano, cumin, coriander, salt, pepper.
Roll into 1" balls, spray with oil. Bake at 425Â°F for 15-20 mins until browned and 160Â°F.
Make rice: boil chicken stock with salt and garlic, add rice, simmer 20 mins. Stir in lemon zest, dill, butter.
Make tzatziki: mix grated cucumber, yogurt, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, salt.
Serve meatballs over lemon dill rice with tzatziki and sliced cucumbers.

name: Baked Crispy Yukon Gold Potatoes
instructions: Preheat oven to 450Â°F. Boil water with baking soda, parboil potato pieces 7-8 mins.
Drain potatoes, shake in colander to rough up surfaces.
Toss with olive oil, garlic powder, salt, and rosemary.
Spread on baking sheet, bake 20 mins until golden and crispy, flipping halfway.
Sprinkle with fresh parsley and serve.

name: Garlic Fried Rice with Egg
instructions: Fry minced garlic in 3 tbsp oil over medium-low heat until golden brown. Turn off heat, mix in rice.
Turn heat to medium, add butter, soy sauce, salt. Stir-fry 2-3 mins until heated through. Mix in scallions.
In separate pan, fry 2 eggs sunny side up in 2 tsp oil with a sprinkle of salt.
Serve eggs on top of rice.

name: Maxi's Mac & Cheese
instructions: Boil pasta until very al dente (1-2 mins less than package), drain.
Toast pepper in pot until fragrant (1-2 mins), add butter.
Whisk in flour, cook 1 min. Gradually add milk 1/2 cup at a time, whisking until incorporated.
Whisk until sauce bubbles and thickens (2-3 mins). Stir in pecorino romano.
Add pasta, cook 2-3 mins until desired tenderness. Top with pepper and more cheese.

name: Easy Asian Style Chuck Roast
instructions: Dice chuck into 2" cubes. Mix with soy sauce, honey, sesame oil, smashed garlic, ginger, and green onions in slow cooker.
Cook on low 3-4 hours until meat falls apart easily.
Remove beef chunks and shred. Remove ginger, garlic, and onions from liquid.
Stir arrowroot mixed with cold water into braising liquid to thicken.
Add shredded meat back, mix well. Serve with green onions and sesame seeds.

name: Tallow Fried Buttermilk Chicken Tenders
instructions: Marinate chicken in buttermilk for at least 2 hours or overnight.
Mix flour with salt, pepper, cayenne, garlic powder, and paprika.
Heat tallow to 375Â°F in a cast iron or stainless steel pan.
Dredge tenders in flour, dip in buttermilk, then flour again for crispy coating.
Fry in batches until golden crispy. Drain on wire rack, season with salt immediately.

name: Mexican Street Tacos (Chicken)
instructions: Mix marinade: orange juice, vinegar, lime juice, garlic, chipotle powder, oregano, paprika, cinnamon, salt, pepper.
Marinate chicken thighs at least 1 hour or overnight.
Grill over medium-high heat 4-5 mins per side until 165Â°F.
Rest a few minutes, then chop into small pieces.
Serve in tortillas with cotija cheese, roasted corn, pico, and guacamole.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Season chicken with salt, pepper. Brown both sides in coconut oil over medium-high heat. Remove (doesn't need to be fully cooked).
SautÃ© peppers and onions 3-4 mins. Add garlic and ginger, cook 1 min until fragrant.
Add curry paste, cook 4-5 mins until dark and caramelized.
Slowly stir in coconut milk, simmer 5-10 mins. Add red pepper flakes if desired.
Slice chicken into bite-size pieces, add back with juices. Simmer 15 mins until cooked through.
Top with fresh cilantro and lime juice.

name: Pot Roast
instructions: Season roast with salt and pepper. Sear on all sides in oil in Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Remove.
Add onions and carrots, cook until colored and softened, about 5 mins.
Add garlic 1 min, then tomato paste 2-3 mins, stirring constantly.
Add wine, broth, thyme, bay leaves, pinch of salt. Bring to simmer.
Cover and roast at 350Â°F for 2.5 hours.
Rest roast 20 mins. Skim fat from liquid, remove herbs, stir in cold butter. Serve with mashed potatoes and parsley.

name: Lasagna
instructions: Brown ground meat, drain fat. Add tomato sauce, simmer 10-15 mins. Season to taste.
Mix egg, ricotta, chopped parsley, salt, pepper until emulsified.
Cook noodles until al dente (slightly underdone).
Layer in baking dish: thin meat sauce, noodles, 1/3 ricotta, parmesan, meat sauce. Repeat twice.
Top with remaining noodles, meat sauce, mozzarella, and parmesan.
Cover with foil, bake at 350Â°F for 45 mins. Remove foil, bake 15 more mins.
Cool 15-20 mins before cutting. Top with fresh basil.

name: Cava Bowls with Honey Harissa Chicken
instructions: Mix chicken with harissa, honey, paprika, cumin, salt, pepper, olive oil.
Slice and bake at 400Â°F for 20 mins until cooked through.
For pickled onions: heat vinegar, water, sugar, salt until dissolved. Pour over sliced onions, cool.
Build bowls with rice, spinach, cucumber, tomatoes, hummus, feta, pickled onions, and chicken.
Drizzle with yogurt dill sauce.

name: Moroccan Meat Skewers (Kefta)
instructions: Mix ground lamb with harissa, parsley, cilantro, grated onion, cumin, paprika, salt, pepper, turmeric, ginger.
Mold mixture onto skewers.
Grill 3-4 mins per side until 160Â°F internal temp. Or bake at 400Â°F for 17 mins.
Serve with rice, tzatziki, and fresh veggies.

name: Sweet & Spicy Chicken Meatballs
instructions: Make sauce: combine hot sauce, honey, vinegar, pinch of salt, red pepper flakes. Boil then simmer 10 mins to thicken.
Mix chicken with panko, egg, garlic, paprika, onion powder, salt, pepper. Don't overmix.
Roll into 1-2" meatballs, place on parchment-lined baking sheet.
Bake at 475Â°F for 12-15 mins until 165Â°F, flipping halfway.
Brush meatballs with sauce, return to oven to finish. Drizzle more sauce and serve.

name: Steak & Onions with Crispy Rosemary Potatoes
instructions: Salt steak and let sit at room temperature 1 hour.
Cut potatoes into 1" chunks. Toss with olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic powder, rosemary.
Bake at 450Â°F for 30 mins, flipping halfway.
Pat steak dry. Sear in hot pan with ghee, a few mins per side. Use thermometer for desired temp.
Let pan cool slightly, add sliced onions with a pinch of salt. Cook 10 mins until softened.
Rest steak while onions cook. Serve steak topped with onions and potatoes on the side.

name: Mediterranean Meatballs
instructions: Mix ground turkey with crumbled feta, chopped spinach, red onion, garlic, mint, sun dried tomatoes.
Add panko, egg, mayo, cumin, oregano, paprika, salt, pepper. Mix gently.
Form into meatballs and place on baking sheet.
Roast at 425Â°F for 20 mins (17 mins convection), flipping halfway.
Serve with tzatziki, rice, or in pita.

name: Perri Perri Chicken
instructions: Mix as marinade. Add salt and pepper as needed. Honey, dijon, soy sauce is optional. Serve with rice and vegetable.
